mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities module¶

Provides utility functions for working with the waypoints

class mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities.HalfSpaceParams(normal: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]] = array([[1.], [0.], [0.]]), point: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]] = array([[1.], [0.], [0.]]))¶

Bases: object

Class defining a halfspace

print() → None¶

Print the commands to the console.

set(normal: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], point: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → None¶
Sets the normal vector and the point on the halfspace. The passed in normal

vector is normalized to the unit vector

Parameters:

  • normal – New normal vector. Must not have a zero magnitude

  • point – New point on halfspace

class mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities.WaypointIndices¶

Bases: object

Stores pointers to the indices to the previous, current, and next waypoints

increment_pointers(num_waypoints: int) → None¶
Updates the pointers to point at the next index. A value of IND_OOB is assigned

to pointers when the number of waypoints has been exceeded

Parameters:

num_waypoints – Maximum index allowed. A value of IND_OOB is assigned when index >= this value

mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities.extract_waypoints(waypoints: MsgWaypoints, ptr: WaypointIndices) → tuple[ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]]¶

Extracts the previous, current, and next waypoints

Parameters:

  • waypoints – The waypoints from which to construct the path

  • ptr – The indices of the waypoints being used for the path

Returns:

waypoint from the previous index (w_{i-1}) current: current waypoint or 100 meters beyond the previous if the current is out of bounds (w_i) next_wp: next waypoint or 200 meters beyond previous if index is out of bounds (w_{i+1})

Return type:

previous

mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities.get_airspeed(waypoints: MsgWaypoints, ptr: WaypointIndices) → float¶
Extracts the airspeed from the waypoints. Current waypoint airspeed is used

unless the current waypoint is out of bounds

Parameters:

  • waypoints – The waypoints to be followed

  • ptr – The indices of the waypoints being used for the path

Returns:

The speed at which the UAV should proceed to the current waypoint

Return type:

airspeed

mav_sim.chap11.path_manager_utilities.inHalfSpace(pos: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]], hs: HalfSpaceParams) → bool¶

Determine whether the position is in the next half-space

Parameters:

  • pos – Position being evaluated

  • hs – halfspace parameters

Returns:

True if pos is in the halfpace, False otherwise
